body:
God tier, romantic                                                                                                        

(although raindragon is right)
Kinda weird story. But pretty much everything is weird when it comes down to Japan so no surprise there.

This is a perfect example of why you should never overdo a dialect or try to imitate arcane language.  It sounds ridiculous to the internal ear, it's hard to read, and it shows that the interpreter has no writing experience.  If they did, they would know that you never use your idea of "old speak" on every other word.  One or two words for the entire piece works nicely.
